Package frontend.ast.config

package frontend.ast.config
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    frontend.ast
     
    frontend.ast.config.style
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Assessor
    The assessor node contains properties for setting the name and role of the assessor It should always only use either name or first + lastname, but never both Role should never be supplied without having set up the name properly
    Assessors
    The assessors node groups together all assessors specified by the user.
    Author
    The author node represents an author of the document
    Authors
    The authors node groups together all authors specified by the user
    Configuration
    The configuration node groups together all configurations
    Emphasis
    The emphasis node contains text that should be emphasised in the document.
    Publication
    The publication node represents the publication configuration
    Title
    The title node contains the title of the document
    TitleText
    A title text node either contains a type of emphasis or a text.
    Work
    The work node contains text containing a work that should be emphasised in the document.
